scripts.all-in-one: (npm run docker-test:stop || npm run docker:stop || echo 0) && npm run re-install-build && npm run prettier-lint && npm run docker-test
scripts.clean: (rd /s /q node_modules || echo 0) && (rd /s /q coverage || echo 0) && (rd /s /q dist || echo 0) && (del package-lock.json || echo 0)
scripts.docker:start: npm run docker:image-build && npm run docker:container-up
scripts.docker:stop: npm run docker:container-down && npm run docker:image-remove
scripts.docker:restart: (npm run docker:stop || echo 0) && npm run re-install-build && npm run docker:start
scripts.docker-test: (npm run docker-test:start || echo 0) && (npm run docker-test:stop || echo 0)
scripts.docker-test:start: npm run docker-test:image-build && npm run docker-test:container-up && (docker logs -f %npm_package_name%-app-1 || docker logs -f $npm_package_name-app-1 || echo 0) && (docker cp %npm_package_name%-app-1:/app/coverage/ coverage || docker export $npm_package_name-app-1:\app\coverage\ coverage || echo 0)
scripts.docker-test:stop: npm run docker-test:container-down && npm run docker:image-remove
scripts.docker-test:restart: (npm run docker-test:stop || echo 0) && npm run re-install-build && npm run docker-test:start
scripts.install-build:production: npm run install:production && npm run build
scripts.prettier-lint: npm run prettier-lint:simple && npm run prettier-lint:simple && npm run prettier-lint:simple
scripts.prettier-lint:simple: npm install && npm run prettier && npm run lint
scripts.re-install-build: npm run clean && npm run install-build
scripts.re-install-build:production: npm run clean && npm run install-build:production
scripts.start:dev: npm install && set NODE_ENV=development && ts-node-dev src/server.ts
scripts.test: npm install && set NODE_ENV=testing && jest -c jest.config.js
scripts.test-coverage:complete: npm run test-coverage:unit && npm run test-coverage
scripts.test:integration: npm install && set NODE_ENV=testing && jest -c jest.integration.config.js
scripts.test:unit: npm install && set NODE_ENV=testing && jest -c jest.unit.config.js
